title: I've noticed signs am a good writer, but I can't bring myself to write. And even if I wanted to try, I'd not know what subject to write about. What is the cause, and how can I overcome it? - Quora

response.answer_text: You obviously need to self-edit after you have written, but to bring yourself to write, you need to allow yourself to fail at each attempt and not fear criticism. I just criticized your opening sentence. If that makes you want to stop writing, then you’re never going to take the chance.
